com.thinkaurelius.titan.core

Interface TitanVertexQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Query, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.VertexQuery

    public interface TitanVertexQuery
extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.VertexQuery
    TitanQuery constructs and executes a query over incident edges from the perspective of a vertex.

    A TitanQuery extends Blueprint's Query by some Titan specific convenience methods. Using TitanQuery proceeds in two steps: 1) Define the query by specifying what to retrieve and 2) execute the query.
    A TitanQuery is initialized by calling TitanVertex.query() on the vertex itself.

    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (http://www.matthiasb.com)

      • group

        TitanVertexQuery group(TypeGroup group)
        Query for only those relations having a type included in the given TypeGroup.

        This can be significantly more efficient than specifying all types explicitly.

        Parameters:
        group - group of types to restrict query to.
        Returns:
        this query
        See Also:
        TypeGroup

      • has

        TitanVertexQuery has(TitanLabel label,
                   TitanVertex vertex)
        Query only for edges that have a unidirected edge matching pointing to the given vertex

        It is expected that this label is unidirected (TitanLabel.isUnidirected() and the query is restricted to edges having an incident unidirectional edge pointing to the given vertex.

        Parameters:
        label - Label
        vertex - Vertex to point unidirectional edge to
        Returns:
        this query

      • has

        TitanVertexQuery has(String type,
                   Object value)
        Query only for edges that have an incident property or unidirected edge matching the given value.

        If type is a property key, then the query is restricted to edges having an incident property matching this key-value pair. If type is an edge label, then it is expected that this label is unidirected (TitanLabel.isUnidirected() and the query is restricted to edges having an incident unidirectional edge pointing to the value which is expected to be a TitanVertex.

        Specified by:
        has in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Query
        Specified by:
        has in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.VertexQuery
        Parameters:
        type - TitanType name
        value - Value for the property of the given key to match, or vertex to point unidirectional edge to
        Returns:
        this query

      • limit

        TitanVertexQuery limit(long limit)
        Sets the retrieval limit for this query.

        When setting a limit, executing this query will only retrieve the specified number of relations. Note, that this also applies to counts.

        Specified by:
        limit in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Query
        Specified by:
        limit in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.VertexQuery
        Parameters:
        limit - maximum number of relations to retrieve for this query
        Returns:
        this query

      • vertexIds

        VertexList vertexIds()
        Retrieves all vertices connected to this query's central vertex by edges matching the conditions defined in this query.

        No guarantee is made as to the order in which the vertices are listed. Use VertexList.sort() to sort by vertex idAuthorities most efficiently.

        The query engine will determine the most efficient way to retrieve the vertices that match this query.

        Specified by:
        vertexIds in interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.VertexQuery
        Returns:
        A list of all vertices connected to this query's central vertex by matching edges
